channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Preserving the Dollar: The Role of CBDCs in Securing Economic Stability for Future Generations
item.description: As financial systems evolve, preserving the US dollar's dominance will require skillful policy management and the integration of cutting-edge technologies.

item.title: Amazon is cracking down on RTO holdouts and ‘speaking directly’ to employees who haven’t spent enough time in the office
item.description: Amazon is getting more serious about its return-to-office mandate—it’s now having one-on-one chats with employees who aren't spending enough "meaningful" time in the office.

item.title: Can Equal Weight Solve Our Concentration Crisis? Not So Fast…
item.description: Mega-cap concentration has exploded since 2015. The corollary to an increasingly top-heavy benchmark is that market diversification and breadth have never been more limited. A multifactor methodology can be a restorative balance to US equities when more traditional measures fall short.

item.title: Stellantis tells owners of over 24,000 Chrysler Pacifica hybrid minivans to park outside because the batteries can catch fire
item.description: The company said Thursday that it's recalling certain 2017 through 2021 Chrysler Pacifica plug-in hybrids, mainly in North America. Some are being recalled for a second time. All can still be driven.

item.title: In Search of the Elusive Neutral Interest Rate
item.description: With Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's semiannual address to the Senate Banking Committee this week fresh in mind, it is an ideal time to consider the drivers of r*.

item.title: Donald Trump uses GOP nomination speech to urge Americans to heal ‘discord and division’ after assassination attempt
item.description: Trump’s address, the longest convention speech in modern history at just under 93 minutes, marked the climax and conclusion of a massive four-day Republican pep rally.

item.title: Commodities for the Long Run?
item.description: Asset classes such as commodities have historically had notable diversification benefits for longer-term investors who are concerned with inflation.

item.title: Puerto Rico will get $325 million in federal funding to boost solar and battery storage projects as power outages persist
item.description: The program, funded by the U.S. Department of Energy, will target community centers and healthcare facilities, as well as common areas in subsidized, multi-family housing.

item.title: Vanguard’s Former OCIO Clients Must Stand Their Ground
item.description: Vanguard's OCIO clients should be wary of the higher-fee active funds and alternative investments that are now open to them.

item.title: Tesla to power France’s biggest battery storage facility—boosting the nation’s capacity to store green electricity
item.description: U.K. developer Harmony Energy Ltd. has begun construction. The battery system will be fully operational by the end of next year.
